sneckomod:Blunderbus.NAME: Blunderbus
sneckomod:Blunderbus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. Deal damage one more time for every 3+ cost card in hand.

sneckomod:CheapStock.NAME: Cheap Stock
sneckomod:CheapStock.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, sneckomod:Muddle the highest cost card in your hand.
sneckomod:CheapStock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:Cheat.NAME: Pure Luck
sneckomod:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain sneckomod:Lucky until the end of turn. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain sneckomod:Lucky until the end of turn.

sneckomod:DangerNoodle.NAME: Danger Noodle
sneckomod:DangerNoodle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand, then Exhaust those cards. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:Deception.NAME: Deception
sneckomod:Deception.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.NAME: Defensive Flair
sneckomod:DefensiveFlair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, increased by !M! for each sneckomod:Offclass card in your hand.

sneckomod:DiceBlock.NAME: Dice Block
sneckomod:DiceBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! - !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Always gain !B! Block.

sneckomod:DiceBoulder.NAME: Dice Boulder
sneckomod:DiceBoulder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

sneckomod:DiceCrush.NAME: Dice Crush
sneckomod:DiceCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Always deal !D! damage.

sneckomod:DragonsHoard.NAME: Dragon's Hoard
sneckomod:DragonsHoard.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to this card's cost. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Double your Strength.
sneckomod:DragonsHoard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to this card's cost +1. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Double your Strength.

sneckomod:FourOfAKind.NAME: Four Of A Kind
sneckomod:FourOfAKind.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have played exactly 4 sneckomod:Suits this turn. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:FourOfAKind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played if you have played exactly 4 sneckomod:Suits this turn. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played 4 Suits this turn!

sneckomod:IronFang.NAME: Iron Fang
sneckomod:IronFang.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.NAME: Improvised Attack
sneckomod:ImprovisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain a random sneckomod:Offclass Attack and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.NAME: Improvised Guard
sneckomod:ImprovisedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain a random sneckomod:Offclass Skill and sneckomod:Muddle it.

sneckomod:Nope.NAME: Nope
sneckomod:Nope.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random card of the same class.
sneckomod:Nope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random card of the same class.

sneckomod:MasterEye.NAME: Master Eye
sneckomod:MasterEye.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional card each turn.
sneckomod:MasterEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Become Confused. NL Draw !M! additional card each turn.

sneckomod:Memorize.NAME: Memorize
sneckomod:Memorize.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. Fleeting. NL Choose a card which started *Unidentified. sneckomod:Identify it.
sneckomod:Memorize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. Fleeting. Retain. NL Choose a card which started *Unidentified. sneckomod:Identify it.

sneckomod:MintCondition.NAME: Mint Condition
sneckomod:MintCondition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each unique sneckomod:Suit in your hand. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Draw 2 cards next turn.

sneckomod:MixItUp.NAME: Mix It Up!
sneckomod:MixItUp.DESCRIPTION: *Transform your Potions. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:MorePower.NAME: More Power!
sneckomod:MorePower.DESCRIPTION: Obtain an additional Upgraded *Unidentified card reward at the end of combat.

sneckomod:Mudshield.NAME: Mud Shield
sneckomod:Mudshield.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you sneckomod:Muddle a card, gain !M! Block.

sneckomod:PoisonParadise.NAME: Poison Paradise
sneckomod:PoisonParadise.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Do it again. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:PoisonParadise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Do it again. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:QuickBite.NAME: Snake Rake
sneckomod:QuickBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! - 2 cards. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.

sneckomod:QuickMove.NAME: Quick Move
sneckomod:QuickMove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle the highest-cost card in your hand.
sneckomod:QuickMove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle the !M! highest-cost cards in your hand.

sneckomod:RainOfDice.NAME: Rain of Dice
sneckomod:RainOfDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !qqq! - !D! damage to a random enemy. NL sneckomod:Muddle this, then return this to your hand.

sneckomod:Restock.NAME: Restock
sneckomod:Restock.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard your hand. NL Draw 5-10 cards, then sneckomod:Muddle your hand. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:Rotation.NAME: Rotation
sneckomod:Rotation.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Rotation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Discard all sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL Draw that many cards plus !M!. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SerpentBottle.NAME: Serpent Bottle
sneckomod:SerpentBottle.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 2 Cards. NL Choose a card to sneckomod:Muddle. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SerpentBottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 2 Cards. NL Choose !M! cards to sneckomod:Muddle. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SerpentIdol.NAME: Serpent Idol
sneckomod:SerpentIdol.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Choose 1 of 3 random sneckomod:Offclass cards to gain. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SerpentMind.NAME: Exotic Form
sneckomod:SerpentMind.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Whenever you play an sneckomod:Offclass card, gain 1 Strength.
sneckomod:SerpentMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an sneckomod:Offclass card, gain 1 Strength.

sneckomod:SlitherStrike.NAME: Slither Strike
sneckomod:SlitherStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

sneckomod:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
sneckomod:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next sneckomod:Offclass card is played twice.
sneckomod:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 sneckomod:Offclass cards are played twice.

sneckomod:SnakeSap.NAME: Snake Sap
sneckomod:SnakeSap.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Deal !qqq! - !D! damage. NL Gain 1 - !M! [E] . NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
sneckomod:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unidentified cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SnekBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unidentified cards in your deck.

sneckomod:SnekBite.NAME: Snek Bite
sneckomod:SnekBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card to sneckomod:Muddle.
sneckomod:SnekBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose !M! cards to sneckomod:Muddle.

sneckomod:SoulCleanse.NAME: Soul Cleanse
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SoulCleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand. Cards sneckomod:Muddled this way cannot cost 3.

sneckomod:SoulDraw.NAME: Soul Draw
sneckomod:SoulDraw.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain !M! random sneckomod:Offclass cards. NL They gain Retain. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SoulExchange.NAME: Soul Exchange
sneckomod:SoulExchange.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw 1 card, NL Choose a card, then *Transform your hand to that card's class. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:SoulExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Draw !M! cards, NL Choose a card, then *Transform your hand to that card's class. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
sneckomod:SoulRoll.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card to sneckomod:Muddle.

sneckomod:ToothAndClaw.NAME: Tooth And Claw
sneckomod:ToothAndClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain a Shiv for each unique sneckomod:Suit in your hand.
sneckomod:ToothAndClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain an Upgraded Shiv for each unique sneckomod:Suit in your hand.

sneckomod:TyphoonFang.NAME: Typhoon Fang
sneckomod:TyphoonFang.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Deal !D! damage. NL sneckomod:Overflow: This turn, whenever you sneckomod:Overflow, play a copy of this card.

sneckomod:Yearn.NAME: Yearn
sneckomod:Yearn.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Give them Retain. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
sneckomod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! - 2 Weak and Vulnerable. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Always apply 2 of each.

sneckomod:Transmogrify.NAME: Transmogrify
sneckomod:Transmogrify.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 2 Relics to lose. NL Obtain a random Relic of the same rarity. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no Relicsss to ssswap.

sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash to Treasure
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:TrashToTreasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: sneckomod:Snekproof. NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:UnendingSupply.NAME: Unending Supply
sneckomod:UnendingSupply.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a random sneckomod:Offclass card.

sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.NAME: Unlimited Rolls
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a *Soul *Roll with Exhaust.
sneckomod:UnlimitedRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain a *Soul *Roll with Exhaust.

sneckomod:WideSting.NAME: Wide Sting
sneckomod:WideSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! - !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Upgrade all sneckomod:Offclass cards in your hand.
